org.akubraproject.rmi.remote
Interface RemoteOutputStream

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteBlobCreator
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerBlobCreator, ServerOutputStream
public interface RemoteOutputStream
extends Remote

An interface that lets clients write to an output stream on a remote server.

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close this on the remote side.
 void flush()
          Flushes the remote server stream.
 void write(byte[] b)
          Writes an array of bytes to the remote server stream.
 void write(int b)
          Writes a byte to the remote server stream.
 void write(PartialBuffer b)
          Writes a partial buffer to the remote server stream.
 

Method Detail

write

void write(int b)
           throws IOException,
                  RemoteException
Writes a byte to the remote server stream.

Parameters:
b - the byte to write
Throws:
IOException - error reported by the remote stream
RemoteException - error in rmi transport

flush

void flush()
           throws IOException,
                  RemoteException
Flushes the remote server stream.

Throws:

close

void close()
           throws RemoteException,
                  IOException
Close this on the remote side.

Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - on an error reported by remote
